thread.section_title: Easy Signs Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Easy Signs | easysigns.com.au
thread.title: Korina Fraser
thread.title_full: Easy Signs reviewed by Korina Fraser

author: Korina Fraser
title: Korina Fraser
text: I recently placed an order for 100 corflute signs. The staff at Easy Signs were extremely helpful and accommodating as I needed 8 different artworks and delivery to 2 destinations. I've just received them and they are fantastic quality!!! I'm very happy with the service I received and will recommend Easy Signs to everyone.
